website_summaries.verdict: A surprisingly powerful budget heater that's good for use in small spaces.
pros: Four-position function switch (off, fan, lo, and high)
cons: Suddenly shuts off, likely from overheating

customer_reviews.title: Caught on fire
customer_reviews.text: This was great until it literally caught on fire out of nowhere in the middle of the night. Could have burned the whole place down if I didn't hear the flame right away.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon G.

customer_reviews.title: gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: I like this product. It gets the job done. The only reason im giving it 3 stars is because its noisey. To give the buyers an idea of how big and tall the portable fan/heater is, I have placed a 12 oz beer bottle next to it in the picture. Hope it helps.
customer_reviews.author: sabrina8585

customer_reviews.title: Hazardous I hope that Optimus/Amazon will replace my office heater.
customer_reviews.text: I have had this heater almost for a year now. I was surprised to see that this had happened . It was functioning well up til today. Maybe mine was defective? Someone needs to start explaining? Please & Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Mukamal

customer_reviews.title: Works for my application
customer_reviews.text: This little thing is a trip. Maybe as much heat as a hair dryer. I do live in a very small one room apartment and it is plenty. Can't wait to see my next electric bill and see just how efficient it is. Yes, the thermostat works and yes, both speeds work well. And the tip-over shut-off is instant. I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: The little heater that could!
customer_reviews.text: Powerful, a little noisy, but a strong warm little heater. I dont even know if noisy is the word... not anything we need to turn the volume up to hear over it. Our house is old with minimal insulation, leaving my 2 year old's play room cold. However, since he is unattended in the room, I wanted a heater that wouldnt burn his fingers if touched or burn the house down if a curtain is nearby, or whatever else most heaters warn about. It turns itself off automatically if it tips over or is on an unlevel surface. This is the little heater that could! It warms up his room nicely and we will be buying another for our bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Miller Family

customer_reviews.title: Dead
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't work. I mean it doesn't work at all. I turned it on and it worked for a single second, then nothing. The room was cold (54) so no concern about overheating. I tried turning it off by the dial and back on several times. I even unplugged and replugged it back in a couple times. It clicks like it wants to work and the light comes on, but nothing happens.
customer_reviews.author: Pete Vegan

customer_reviews.title: Worked well... For a month
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for a few months, now it won't run for more than 5 minutes. I know this is supposed to be a safety feature or thermostat feature, but when I first got it, it would run for an hour or two and get my office nice and warm before shutting off then it would turn back on when the temperature dropped again. Now it turns off after about 5 minutes and won't turn back on, no matter what setting I use. I'm going to step up and buy a slightly more expensive heater and hope it won't have a similar issue.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Not energy effecient
customer_reviews.text: When I received my light bill this month I saw it jumped $80 from last month. I called the power company and told me when the power spikes had occurred, which coindided when I was home all day and running the heater. I only use it to h eat my bathroom so it's not freezing in there. I plugged in the heater and went out to check the meter and it was spinning like I was running my clothes dryer. Heater heats very well, but it not energy effecient at all. I will either be looking for another or using this one limited.
customer_reviews.author: Liz in Maine

customer_reviews.title: Fan motor bearing is going out after less than a month
customer_reviews.text: This fan is already having the fan motor bearing going out and it is noisy. I received it April 8th 2016 so it not like it's old. It works good from a heat and fan perspective but it sounds horrible. I expect some fan noise but this is bearing noise. I bought this April 8th so I am hoping the seller will take care of this as the seller shipped fast and everything was fine from that perspective. Terrible product do not buy. IO feel ripped off and have never said that about anything else I have ever bought through Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: STACY GLASGOW

customer_reviews.title: I LIKED THE OLDER ONE I BOUGHT LAST YEAR BETTER
customer_reviews.text: IT is ok, but not as nice and warm as the radiant Optimus I bought last year but was recalled. It is nice and small, good right next to my chair and I do like the cooling fan part in case It gets a little to warm in the room. Very light weight and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: JULIE-O

customer_reviews.title: Quality control
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this, returned it and purchased it again. It has been consistently broken. The first one melted when powered on, had it not been under supervision It would have cause untold damage. The second heated up but the fan did not function. Seek an alternate product if heating or not melting are features you look for in a product.
customer_reviews.author: leslie hale

customer_reviews.title: Hard working little nugget heater
customer_reviews.text: Solid heater that puts out more than the size would suggest. Easily heats our largest master bedroom. Years ago I brought one of these home when laid off from a former employer. Put it in my gameroom and now bought a 2nd for master bedroom. Clicks off if not completely flat on solid surface safety feature. Make sure this is dusted when not in use for long spells. Will spoof burn dust when turned on. We moist/wipe and use compressed air before first use after parked for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Church Griffin

customer_reviews.title: The clicking noise...SOMETIMES...drives me nuts
customer_reviews.text: I meant to return this fan in the time frames allowed, however i wanted to give more time to be sure I absolutely sure of my purchase. The only and main downfall of this product is that sometimes it makes this clicking noise. Which is another reason why I didn’t rush to return as the noise only happened sometimes. The other features are fine and the color is cool and will go well with my future bedroom set, however I am returning it due to that clicking noise. Over time the clicking stopped and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Vega

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight & spits out a lot of heat!
customer_reviews.text: Using this thing at work and have been throughout winter & spring. Never had a problem. it puts out a good amount of heat and is not terribly loud (I mean, most of the sounds at work drown out the motor). It is small, compact and super light. Auto shut-off is a nice thing too, just in case security comes around and wants to yell at you for being a fire hazard. I thought for this price, it might last me a month or 2. I'm on month 7, using it almost every workday, and it is chugging along like a champ.
customer_reviews.author: CraftyReaderTop Contributor: Crochet

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made. Had multiple break within a week
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these. BOTH of them broke within days. The light came on, the little ‘click’ noise came on but the fan never turned on. The other one just made an awful grinding noise. I am returning both. The day that one fo then did work, it seemed to put out a decent amount of heat but that’s all I can speak on because they are cheaply made. I don’t recommend these to anyone. Spend an extra $5-10 and get one that actually works.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael

customer_reviews.title: this place does not permit space heater use so we got her this because it looks like a small fan and weigh it under her desk ...
customer_reviews.text: Where my Wife works the heat doesn't work in the winter and the ac works too well in the summer. this place does not permit space heater use so we got her this because it looks like a small fan and weigh it under her desk it goes unnoticed. She declares it works perfectly and raises the temperature of a small one person office (8x6) from 62 deg F to 73 deg. F making it comfortable for her fingers to work the keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Bob

customer_reviews.title: Good value! Works great- and heats up your space fast
customer_reviews.text: I’ve bought maybe 4 of these. Best value - and last just as long as the $100 Vornado fan heaters (maybe a year if you use it daily like we do) It has a safety feature that shuts the heater off automatically if the unit becomes un-level. Unfortunately on the last one we bought- this feature broke and now it won’t turn on at all without a make shift jig. Would still buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Kacie O

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Fan Heater
customer_reviews.text: I live in Apartment with no heater in the Bathroom. This works GREAT in that bathroom on COLD mornings. I hate coming out of a Hot shower to a Cold room. This Heater works great in my bathroom. Going on my second year using it. Also been using it as a Regular Fan , No Heat setting.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth McClure

customer_reviews.title: Read and Follow the Instructions!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought multiple of these when the heater broke down. They are great for now and then, or for a couple of hours each day, but cannot stand up to heavy use (ie, replacing the actual heater in the house for 6 weeks). Not intended for that, but we had to wait to get heater fixed until parts could be ordered. Definitely follow the instructions and do not plug into an extension cord or surge protector! It uses more power than either allow for, and doing so can result in fire!
customer_reviews.author: Missy Dreavus

customer_reviews.title: Worst heater
customer_reviews.text: One of the worst heaters ever. Not even used it for two months properly and giving me issues. I bought it for office space. The moment you start it, it will work for probably 1-2 mins and gets off and doesnt start for next an hour and then would need to restart after an hour or so. It is so useless, I will need to buy a new heater
customer_reviews.author: Moody

customer_reviews.title: Love this heater
customer_reviews.text: This Heater basically heats up my whole living room and Kitchen. I have a small 3 bedroom apartment and I put the heater in the Kitchen and every room is comfortable. It may take a good hour but when it's going it is awesome. I keep it on all night and have to turn it down because It gets too hot in the apartment. Love it. As long as you have no drafts.
customer_reviews.author: Princessbutterfli

customer_reviews.title: Good value for an efficient small heater
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to stay comfortable in my drafty office, and it did not disappoint. My office is about 12x15 ft, and this heater easily takes the chill off. Most times I turn it on high, leave it on that for about 30 minutes, and then have to turn it down so as not to get too warm. The fan makes about as much noise as you would expect, and with it running under my desk return, no one that's come into my office has even realized it was on.
customer_reviews.author: Cowboy Bob

customer_reviews.title: It was like a burn smell
customer_reviews.text: I do not want to give it any start. I'm not usually write reviews, but at this time I have to do it. I'mvwry Disapontend with this product. As soon as I connect it a weird smell came. It was like a burn smell. I got very scare because I thought it maybe going to explode in my room, so I disconnect it immediately. I give it a second chance. the next day that I got the product I conect it again and it starts working for a couple minutes (3min to 5min), but then it stops working forever. The quality of this product is very poor. I do not recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This item stopped working a few days after the 30 ...
customer_reviews.text: This item stopped working a few days after the 30 day return deadline. I sent it back to the manufacturer to be fixed and have yet to receive it back or get a response from the company! It's been over a month now! Beware! Also, I had to pay shipping and it was more than the cost of the product! I sent it anyway not thinking clearly and hoping to get a new one but I got nothing instead! Again Beware! Update- received a replacement day after the review! Still it took a while but I'll raise the stars for effort!
customer_reviews.author: A. Muhammad

customer_reviews.title: The very first time I used it the whole house smelled funny I can really describe it
customer_reviews.text: I order one it arrived very fast. The very first time I used it the whole house smelled funny I can really describe it, it was a mix of burn and some chemical ( funny smell). So I callled they sent me another one and few weeks later surprise the same thing that horrible smell that jus linger around the house. I am going to have to buy another heather, just waisted my money and time. I don't recommend it. NO
customer_reviews.author: Fabiane Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Loud and at an angle. Poor choice.
customer_reviews.text: The fan and heater work. The tipping sensor is a great addition. Unfortunately this fan/heater sounds like a freight train. The internal components are not tightened/secured properly and are deafening. Its natural angle is also pointed up, not straight ahead, so it is always pointing away from where you want the fan or heat to blow. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Cabala Rind

customer_reviews.title: Junk!
customer_reviews.text: This item only lasted for one use. After that it would turn on for a minute and shut off. I tried to get it to work and well as my other coworkers☹️. I didn’t need to use it right away so it was pasted the return date. Threw it away! Don’t waste your money!!
customer_reviews.author: Amie L.

customer_reviews.title: Came back for a second one!
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the price! I got one a couple of years ago and this year snagged one for my office. It’s good for warming up a small to medium/sized room. Auto-off works when it gets hot or tips. I’ve had no trouble over 2 winters with my first one. If you have a larger room you’ll want a bigger space heater, but for my bedroom and my office this is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Liz W

customer_reviews.title: Once and Done, forget about it
customer_reviews.text: I can't seem to get this thing to work more than once a day. Totally useless. Checked back with my wife and she had trouble with hers not working after the first time either. I waste of money. I have to throw them away because Jan 31st was the last day to send it back, only 6 days past the deadline.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done.
customer_reviews.text: Update 12/26 - it’s been about 3 months and already my heater is broken. The indicator light turns on but the heater does not turn on. Perfect for my cubicle at work. Gives off a burning smell when you turn it on so do not be alarmed. Butning smell happens every time not just the first time. Love the tip over protection.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Malfunctioned on third usage...
customer_reviews.text: Strike one, this product was very noisy right out of the box. A constant rattling sound was emitted almost immediately and did not subside no matter what we did to alleviate it. Strike two, the item sparked when we plugged it in the second time and continued to make noise the entire time it was on. Strike three, the item sparked again and completely stopped working on its third usage. Overall a bad product design and potentially dangerous due to the sparking. The constant rattling did not help. Steer clear of this heater and spend a little more for a better product. This is not a reliable heater and the numerous bad reviews will verify that.
customer_reviews.author: Dan B.

customer_reviews.title: It's a great heater
customer_reviews.text: I love it, It has a heat control option to basically gauge how hot you want your room to become, after a certain amount of time it'll shut off once it reaches that heat gauge. If it tips over or is even slightly off balance it does turn off automatically which is really really nice. If it's covered up it turns off, it's super safe and it's the second one I've owned in my life. The other one I lost and couldn't find. Highly recommended. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Paige Nicole Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money! Don’t buy!
customer_reviews.text: I used the product 4-5 days per week intermittently. Product stopped working less than 2 months after purchasing. It also constantly cut off and on. Ultimately the safety trigger under the bottom side just stopped working one day.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly/Previs Smith

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work
customer_reviews.text: I could tell the box had already been opened. I turned on the fan to heat. Had a horrible burning chemical smell. A minute later it shut itself down. Returning. I don’t know if the seller shipped me a defective fan that someone else returned
customer_reviews.author: AA (Amazon's Anonymous)

customer_reviews.title: Best little heater
customer_reviews.text: I love this little heater. I use it for my desk while at work. Our office keeps the air conditioner very low and most of the girls in the office keep a small heater/fan under their desk. I have had one now for 8 years. They normally last around 3 years. I have had 3 now. And for the price, this is a wonderful heater. It keeps me warm all day long while at work. I even have to put it on the lower heat setting because it can maintain and blow a lot of hot air. Delivered exactly on time and packaged very well. I am very happy with this purchase. I will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: fire hazard!
customer_reviews.text: bought this for my nursery. thank God I started it on my porch because it burst into flames within one minute . i threw it out the window just in time into the snow. 0 starsss
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quit after 3 months!
customer_reviews.text: I used this as a heater in my bathroom. I liked that it had the safety switch if it got knocked over and it put out a good amount of heat. About a week ago it started to have a burning smell and now it won’t turn in at all. I bought it in September of this year. It barely lasted 3 months! The manufacturer warranty is a joke. I’d have to pay $25 to send it in for repair. Since I paid less than $20 to buy it initially, that’s not happening. Definitely disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca P.

customer_reviews.title: Worth to spend
customer_reviews.text: I had to buy this heater for my small workroom where it turns cold quickly at night as there is a big window, this is small and effective heater works as needed with good heat range for 10x12 room size as mine. I love it
customer_reviews.author: Suresh

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Buy!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item for the office. It helps keep me warm and has a sensor that will shut it on and off according to the surrounding temperature which is really helpful. I have even used it within my large bedroom and it helps heat the room pretty decently. Not the best for immediately direct heat unless you are directly by it.
customer_reviews.author: Celeste B.

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price, maybe just mine that’s defective.
customer_reviews.text: Decent heater, didn’t expect much for the price. It does put off a good amount of heat and air movement for such a small device. The only issue I have with it is that every once in a while it will just stop working and I have to unplug it for a few minutes and then it works again. Don’t know what that’s about, otherwise I would’ve given it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Tobi Smith

customer_reviews.title: Lasted through the years without problem.
customer_reviews.text: This has lasted me years. My roommates and I disagreed on the apartment temperature so I got this for my room, and it’s been heavenly. I don’t notice a dent in the power bill, even now at my own place. I’ve only had one problem with it, but it turns out a piece of my long hair was wrapped around the fan so I pulled that out and it worked perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Warm up a small room for under $20!
customer_reviews.text: For under $20, this is an amazing little heater! Some negative reviews cite it being noisey or the knobs coming off, but that type of thing is common with entry-level(or cheap if you wanna be real). It performs like a charm, doesn't kick the circuit and cost less than $20.
customer_reviews.author: C. Michael

customer_reviews.title: Keeping me warm right now
customer_reviews.text: Keeping me warm right now. It's been over a year of almost daily use and this thing keeps on trucking. Well made. Heats great. Hell, even the dog ate a knob and we are still running strong.
customer_reviews.author: Regmanabq

customer_reviews.title: I use to keep the sweat off bathroom walls
customer_reviews.text: I use this in the bathroom during shower. Keeps the sweat off the walls. Has accidental safety trip switch. My space heaters in the shower room last about three to five years. So far this one is still running fine.
customer_reviews.author: MA@SJ

customer_reviews.title: So very loud
customer_reviews.text: Heat is good output. But LOUD.....so very loud. I moved it out of the room and could still hear it. I had to turn my tv up 5 settings to hear it over the fan. I'm going to retun it. I need heat and quiet.
customer_reviews.author: DavidT

customer_reviews.title: ... when u first use it it put off this bad chemical smell for bit then ur socket over heat ...
customer_reviews.text: i would give it a 0 stars lets start with when u first use it it put off this bad chemical smell for bit then ur socket over heat so bad that u see it started to melt if i dident catch it intime there propley been a fire and u bet i would have been taking it to court VERY VERY DANGRES PRODUCT IF LOOKING TO BURN DOWN UR PLACE TO COLLECT INSURENS THIS IS FOR U AND ITS NOT FRUD
customer_reviews.author: Alien zone

customer_reviews.title: Works great and is safe
customer_reviews.text: This is the third unit I have purchased. I bought a second one for myself and gave one as a gift. I feel safe using this unit. I wholeheartedly recommend it and would purchase one again without hesitation
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: This heater produces ultimate heat. The fan forcing the heat is exactly what I wanted. I put it by a sliding glass door and it is perfect! It could easily heat a large room very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Dolly L. Bartley

customer_reviews.title: It works... like a jet engine
customer_reviews.text: I sleep like the dead and this thing will wake me up sometimes. The clowns who say it is quiet or that they like the sound are paid shills... you might want to spend more if you have this in a bedroom and want to sleep.
customer_reviews.author: TEC7658

customer_reviews.title: Works pretty well
customer_reviews.text: This heater feels pretty cheap, but so far it’s working well. It arrived in the mail with just the box it comes in - no additional packaging. The box was dented and torn.
customer_reviews.author: AK99705

customer_reviews.title: just terribly low quality
customer_reviews.text: Work but extremely low quality, fan started to vibrate within a month, now loud getting ready to fail. Disposable, lasted a couple months, that's all. I bought two and both are going so it is not a one off problem, just terribly low quality.
customer_reviews.author: SL

customer_reviews.title: Great if you don’t mind sitting right up on it and the noise
customer_reviews.text: It’s a loud little heater. Something rattles upon turning it on. I used it at the front desk At work when the building has issues with heating and I had to be right up on it to feel the heat.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Noisy
customer_reviews.text: The only complaint is that it is noisy. I got it to use at the office, but it makes too much noise for that so it will have to stay at home. It stated it was quiet but is not. Works well though.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: 4 year review: Works great in small spaces
customer_reviews.text: I sit next to a window at work which has a little bit a leak in it. This makes it really cold at my desk during winter time. Got this fan since no one would fix the leak. The fan puts out a good amount of heat and works as expected. Only complaint is the burning smell it emits immediately after turning it on. You get used to it after a while. The safety feature at the bottom shuts it off if it's not on an even surface.
customer_reviews.author: Sri Harsha Kavuri

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I am sorry to report that upon receiving the heater it made a loud, scary noise and started to smell like it was burning so I immediately unplugged it and put it back in the box for a return. I have used this brand before and had a good experience. I just got a bad one this time.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Roe

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Have purchased this style heater many times but this is model is very cheaply made and the little safety button on the bottom breaks very easily .
customer_reviews.author: Shirley Bice

customer_reviews.title: The heater only worked for 1 or 2 days!
customer_reviews.text: The fact that it did not work after a few days was disappointing! No heat could be produced even when plugged into an electrical outlet/ I need to return it, but in a different packaging since I threw the original box away. Please instruct me on how to do so.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy F. Henderson

customer_reviews.title: poorly built
customer_reviews.text: The fan arrived with a damaged internal fan coil mount. Plastic and not fixable. looks fine but useless as a heater fan portable.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Good for half a month
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this unit at the end of the last cold season as local stores had already shifted seasonal stock and were out. It was only used for less than a month. Then a cold morning happened this fall in the same year, it worked for a minute if that, then shut off. I blew it out with compressed air thinking maybe a sensor was blocked. It never helped. It'll only run for less than a minute then stop. I've bought many space heaters over the years, and used them in the same location and conditions, they have always lasted for at least 4 years.
customer_reviews.author: Realworldproductuser

customer_reviews.title: Burnt out within 24 hrs.
customer_reviews.text: Burnt out within a day of recieving the heater. Cant say if mine was a one-off, but I do know that I've seen roasters from the 70's with more safety features.
customer_reviews.author: Mike oxlong

customer_reviews.title: worked for a couple weeks then stopped
customer_reviews.text: This heater stopped working after 4 weeks. I had to purchase a different one. I do not recommend any one to purchase it.
customer_reviews.author: 101st

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased, WOULD buy again
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect under-your-desk heater. I think I use it EVERY SINGLE DAY! I like the 2 speed levels and the unlimited dial thermostat. The button on the bottom allows for us to feel safe that if it fell over, it would immediately turn off. Safe and sturdy, yet very lightweight. Perfect purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Spangler Team

customer_reviews.title: Good heater
customer_reviews.text: Perfect heater for my bathroom. And I like that it also has a fan only feature which makes it useful in the summer. Only drawback is the safety tip-over switch. It is not internal, but a little button on the bottom that rests on the surface you sit it on. Seems really flimsy
customer_reviews.author: Margie Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Thermostatically controlled heater
customer_reviews.text: I use these heaters to keep hydrant wells and hatch spaces above freezing. They have 2 safety features, a tip switch and overheat protection. When used correctly and kept clean, they function well. My only complaint is i did have 2 that randomly stopped working, but 2 out of 30 or so isn't bad, and they eventually started working.
customer_reviews.author: Duncan J. Wasp

customer_reviews.title: Defective, got it replaced
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this portable heater for my desk space at work, the first item arrived and I was excited to use it however it did not feel like it was generating any heat. I thought maybe it was still new and needed some time to warm up. I had it for a few days and still nothing even when adjusting the combination of knobs. I reached out to Amazon and was able to get a replacement. the replacement has been working just fine!
customer_reviews.author: Diana Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: it has powered up the room quite nicely. That little unit is a real powerhouse
customer_reviews.text: `I bought this item to send to Jamaica where we don't have real winter, but the country at the time was experiencing very cold episodes. My mom is 92 and has been having asthmatic because the place gets so cold. The fan could not have been more opportune time. The caregiver has advised me that as small as it is, it has powered up the room quite nicely. That little unit is a real powerhouse!!
customer_reviews.author: Averil Ramsay-Myers

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend
customer_reviews.text: I normally never write reviews, infact this may be my first one. I was excited to get this product. I had a very similar one for years that worked excellent. This was a total let down. The product lights up that it’s on, but doesn’t work. The fan does not spin. After being plugged in for a couple minutes the product got so hot I had to unplug it. The inside fan/blade sounds like it’s not attached on the inside, it just rattled around. Maybe it broke in transit? Also the safety feature at the bottom makes the fan stand uneven on a flat surface. Overall a horrible product and I will be searching for another fan.
customer_reviews.author: Tayler Marie

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: I initially ordered the fan back in July three weeks later it stopped working returned it got another and a month later that one stopped working it’s affordable and worked well during the time it did but the life span is terrible needless to say if yo I want something long term don’t buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Sapphire

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Heater!
customer_reviews.text: I use this in a small office; works great! Shuts off if tipped over -- handy safety feature. Very nice for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Adams

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: They were just what I wanted and ordered. I will order again if I am in need. It is just the right size and easily stored.
customer_reviews.author: MelvinM

customer_reviews.title: Great and cheap heater with knock-over sensor
customer_reviews.text: I really like the knock-over sensor. I actually use that as the off-switch, lol. I just gently kick it over under my desk and use my foot to pick it back up when I want it back on. I never have to bend down there now.
customer_reviews.author: Justin B.

customer_reviews.title: Bummed about this
customer_reviews.text: This son of a gun stopped working 13 mos after purchase. Come on. Products like this cannot be made to last longer than that? While it was working, it did a decent job of putting out heat. However, it did produce a burning odor a few times when it was on a low setting. That must have been the innards burning up... It's one of those things that "you get what you pay for". I would not re-purchase this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Purchaser of America

customer_reviews.title: Puts out a good deal of heat
customer_reviews.text: Puts out a good deal of heat. I use this in my bathroom in the winter and I absolutely love it. It heats the room up quickly and the blower is nice. The safety anti-tip feature is nice... if I shift the fan slightly while it's on, it cuts off. I enjoy the peace of mind that gives me.
customer_reviews.author: Britt Mabry

customer_reviews.title: Great for price but this one is defective.
customer_reviews.text: So I have been using this heater to knock the chill during the day while home. I went to reposition the heater and it never shut off as the safety mechanism has a short in it. It is a great heater for a small room as it didn't heat my medium size living area.
customer_reviews.author: ebonywyatt

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Worked well for a little over 3 weeks then shut off and won’t go back on. Now it’s outside of the return window, so I have to order something different from somewhere else. When it was working it worked great. I wish it hadn’t broken after such a short time with normal use.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 4 months.
customer_reviews.text: Bought mine on June 13 and has stopped working. Used it 30 mins a day to keep the humidity down while I showered. Old house no vent. Always nice to get out of the shower and have it warm and toasty. Stopped working yesterday. Anyway, that’s what I got for my $20. You experience may be different.
customer_reviews.author: Mark McDaniels

customer_reviews.title: scary heat. this thing will hel pool you find jesus. figuritively or literally
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. The pressure sensor (acts like a cars remote starter hood pin) is used as foot. The pin depresses to allow circuit connection to function. This thing can blow itself onto its side. The only thing that makes that okay is because when the pin is not depressed, it shuts the unit off automatically. Very cheap, flimsy, basic and scary. Please look elsewhere. For the sake of your safety and your family. Hopefully Amazon allows me tk recommend: Lasko 360 degree heater. Check it out.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: didb't work
customer_reviews.text: Plugged it in right out of the box. Wouldn't power on at all. Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.author: K.B.

customer_reviews.title: It's pretty loud and doesn't provide all that much heat either
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't stand more than 5 minutes on the highest setting before simply shutting off. It's pretty loud and doesn't provide all that much heat either. I took a risk on a cheaper product, and the risk definitely didn't pay off.
customer_reviews.author: C. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 2 months!
customer_reviews.text: My heater stopped working after two months. I'm editing my review...It started working again today. I had reset it yesterday and that didnt help. When I got home today I turned it on with no issues. Its heats pretty well for a small heater fan.
customer_reviews.author: Jaye

customer_reviews.title: Let's do it again!
customer_reviews.text: Live in an RV. Safety is a major factor. Had one of these for a few years until it died. Was pleased to order another.
customer_reviews.author: Dena Tuveng

customer_reviews.title: Compact but powerful
customer_reviews.text: This heater is great, it's very compact, but with enough power to warm up a medium to large room. I really like the Tip-Over Safety Switch feature, if if falls or tips over, it will shut off automatically, which makes it very safe. I think it could be a a little quieter, but it's not terribly noisy. For the price, I think is a great purchase overall.
customer_reviews.author: Raul Herrera

customer_reviews.title: Warm
customer_reviews.text: It’s will keep your small space very small but a bit noisy.
customer_reviews.author: Osama Yassin

customer_reviews.title: the idea of warm heated feet in the bathroom at 6am really helps make the mornings great for me
customer_reviews.text: Got this for the bathroom. I use it on my feet when I have to wake up in the darkest hours of the morning. the idea of warm heated feet in the bathroom at 6am really helps make the mornings great for me. This heater will not warm a huge room. But it will keep your feet warm in a bathroom, and would probably be great in an office too.
customer_reviews.author: Angelle

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I use it in the winter to warm up the bathroom before showering. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Great for office or bedroom.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great heater for small space not that great of a fan though . Big positive the heat element is covered so you won't get a burn from rubbing against it Also only works when plugged in directly no extension power bars
customer_reviews.author: Boone Carlisle

customer_reviews.title: B.A.D
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of them at the same time. Neither warmed very well. Put both in our 2 car garage to keep the dogs warm on 20 degree days, and one is already broken. The other barely does much. Buying a better set of heaters today, and trashing these.
customer_reviews.author: Wes

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: Buy a better unit ! Second one I bought second one that broke just passed the 30 days of return will not be purchasing again. It's cheaper to spend more money on a higher quality unit
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Avigspo

customer_reviews.title: Better than I expected.
customer_reviews.text: Turned out to be a nice, reliable little heater. Doesn't put out an incredible amount of heat but the thermostat works well and keeps room temp consistent. Glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Lomond

customer_reviews.title: Not at all what I expected
customer_reviews.text: Its puts out great heat when you can get it to stay on. Should have went with another brand
customer_reviews.author: Kip

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Well, it turns out I'm not going to die of hypothermia in my office after all. This unit works great! Very user friendly with a 6 setting dial for temperature and another for 'Fan/750 watt/1500 Watts'. After opening, I turned mine (with numb fingers) to the 750-watt setting with the temperature knob to three and my office warmed up in a very short amount of time. Absolutely worth the money- now we'll see if it lasts! :D
customer_reviews.author: Cassie S.

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 2.5 months w/ minimal use
customer_reviews.text: Fair but not stellar heat output so it didn't burn up. It was fairly quiet, however... Bought it in July 2020. It's now mid-October 2020 & it's dead! No blocked airflow, misuse, thermostat was set properly & was used very little. One cold morning, I turned it on, it ran for 10 minutes & then It just said nope, I'm done.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Noisy fan. Heats well, temp cycles ton't seem to matter
customer_reviews.text: very small. and while the fan is great, you can't really adjust the speed of the fan - it has to be on high. There are 2 selections to make it hotter, but they both feel the same temperature. It's also VERY noisy. I keep it in my office which is about 10 x 8. works well for heating the office and i keep it about 5 ft from my desk on the floor - i still have to turn it off when I take a phone call
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Safe, gentle heat
customer_reviews.text: It’s not a ceramic heater, but it gently heats up a room the size of a bedroom in about 10-15 minutes. I feel safe with this fan. The controls are easy to understand and use. I like the carrying handle, and the safety tip over mechanism.
customer_reviews.author: R Randolph

customer_reviews.title: Warm
customer_reviews.text: Works great and oscillates. I ordered another one, and it arrived broken. However, company shipped me a new one before I even returned the other one.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Sharpe

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for a personal fan and heater !
customer_reviews.text: I bought this little heater to put right beside my bed. When I only need a fan, it is just perfect for keeping fresh air moving around my face for easier breathing at night. When the weather is cold, and I want a little heat for a while to warm it up in that part of the bedroom, this is also perfect. No more putting on my Jammies in the cold with this awesome little heater !
customer_reviews.author: Bobby & Yvonne

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Nice little heater for the price. My office is close to an outside door so the heat from the central unit gets sucked right out every time someone goes in or out the door. This thing is doing a great job keeping my office toasty.
customer_reviews.author: Tempokitty

customer_reviews.title: Waste
customer_reviews.text: The heat output won’t let me go to the second notch, if I do it turns itself off after a couple seconds(overheating with no reason to over heat) The safety feature on the bottom went out the second day I had it. The heater literally works when it wants to. Sometimes it won’t work if the safety sensor has pressure applied to it(when it should actually work)
customer_reviews.author: Monique Banks

customer_reviews.title: A little noisy
customer_reviews.text: Not bad for the money. A little noisy. Don’t care for their defective return, have to pay freight to China and $25.00 charge for handling and return postage of their defective item. Not cool.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie W.

customer_reviews.title: Not really safe
customer_reviews.text: It died after continuous use for 3 weeks when the temperature was 32° out... Very disappointing.. had to buy a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina  Whisman

product_meta.title: Optimus H-1322 Portable 2-Speed Fan Heater with Thermostat
product_meta.description: Size:9.2 x 10.5 x 5.5User friendly and safe this portable fan heater with thermostat includes two heat settings of 750 and 1500 watts, automatic thermostat control, four position function switch with off, fan, lo and hi, fan only setting, internal heat limiting thermostat, thermal cut-off safety device and power indicator light.
feature_bullets: 2 Heat Settings (750 and 1500 watts) and Automatic Thermostat Control
4 Position Function Switch (Off, Fan, Lo, Hi) and Fan Only Setting
Internal Heat Limiting Thermostat, Thermal Cut-off Safety Device

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.8 out of 5 stars2,548 ratings3.8 out of 5 stars
